channel.title: Posts on Joslin Goh
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Joslin Goh

item.title: Teachable Conversational Agents for Crowdwork
item.description: What a great start to the year! Our paper about teachable conversational agents in crowdwork is accepted to CSCW.

item.title: Curiosity Notebook
item.description: Hooray! We submitted the camera-ready version of the paper on Curiosity Notebook for CSCW 2021 to ACM.

item.title: CHI 2021
item.description: Congratulations to Jessy Ceha for her CHI 2021 paper that was awarded Best Paper Honorable Mention.
